title: DearBud Chatbot
description: A Mental Health Chatbot designed to support mental well-being through friendly conversations and insightful guidance

title: Instagram Clone Web APP
description: A personalized Instagram clone with optimized user data access and streamlined content navigation.

title: P2P Payment Service
description: A scalable Peer-to-Peer payment platform for secure transactions and data integrity.

title: Rate Limiter
description: A Rate Limiter developed from scratch, integrating Token Bucket, Fixed Counter, and Fixed Window algorithms with multithreading for precise resource management in distributed systems.

title: TinyURL
description: A custom TinyURL generation system from scratch, implementing efficient algorithms and data structures to generate shortened URLs, resulting in streamlined link sharing and improved user experience.

title: Search Engine
description: A Python-based search engine tailored for engineering blogs, optimizing content retrieval for enhanced knowledge accessibility among professionals.
